column2: "Wow, Las Vegas in an instant, without even needing to pinpoint the location... I'll say it again, ARKS technology sure is amazing."
"Ether and photons have mostly the same properties so, in theory, Earthlings should also be able to use teleportation technology."
"It's just not possible yet, even in theories, because we haven't caught up technology-wise."
"If we put a lot of time and effort into it, we could do it... but that's a different story."
"However... the Mother Cluster members that appeared last time did something like teleportation."
"While it's likely the power of an embodied weapon, I can't really deny the possibility of secret technology. "
"Besides, there's something more dangerous than an embodied weapon lurking around."
"...You, who is sneaking around there. Come out and show yourself. Or do you want to be shot?"
"W-What?!"
"H-How did you realize I was here? I was even quietly teleported..."
"You haven't even hidden your presence. Jeez, even though I told you over and over not to come. You just don't listen, do you?"
"Hey, Ms. Xiera. You're an accomplice in this too, right?"
"U-Uhm... well... it's in my nature to never turn down a request for help, so..."
"Good grief."
"I'm... sorry that I tagged along without saying anything... but I want to know, no matter what! I want to find out what's going on..."
"And... I want to find out how to use my power."
"Hm... it looks like nothing I say will change your mind. Good grief."
"Don't you ever leave our side, got it?"
"Got it!"
"Huh? Who is that? Someone sent to meet us?"
"...! That appearance! That's..."
"Everyone fall back!"
"Hey, big bro. That person..."
"Damn it!"
"She disappeared?!"
"Here I am."
"My, my... what good reactions you have. Now it feels worth coming here."
"Of all the things, we end up meeting you here..."
"Demon... Phaleg Ives."
"Even if you label me so cruelly, I only came here because I sensed someone powerful."
"There are no reasons required to seek the powerful... Don't you feel the same way, <%me>?"
"How do you know <%me>'s name...?"
"I was told it by Mother, that there would be a very powerful person here."
"Then, you're also-!"
"Correct! Mother Cluster Apostle of Fire, Phaleg Ives. I hope you'll remember me."
"That said, I don't take orders from Mother. I'm allowed to act freely and independently in order to fight the members of Earth Guide."
"You mean 'freely and independently kill them'."
"So, were you commanded by Mother to come and kill us, demon?"
"I have no real interest in what Mother or yourselves are trying to accomplish. You can both do whatever you like."
"I only have one pure desire, as a person, a natural want."
"I want to fight strong opponents."
"test"
